message: Let's start with a reasonable offer, Bob. I believe this split reflects our positions in this game.
Alice, your starting offer was a bit unfair. I'm proposing a more balanced split. Let's be reasonable and avoid letting inflation eat away at our potential gains.
Bob, I understand you want a fair deal, but your offer doesn't reflect the time pressure. I'm willing to compromise, but let's not waste time with unrealistic expectations.
Alice, we're getting closer, but time is literally money in this game.  I'm offering you a significant portion, but I need to be mindful of the inflation. Let's make a deal!
Bob, this is my final offer. You need to consider the impact of inflation on your potential gains. Take this deal while you still can!
Alice, it seems we both want a significant piece of the pie.  Let's be practical - a 50/50 split ensures we both benefit before inflation erodes any more of our potential gains.
